thread.section_title: Rydges Kensington London - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Would not return
thread.title_full: Would not return - Review of Rydges Kensington London, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Lred69
title: Would not return
text: Stayed here for 1 night and would not return. Staff were rude and more interested in finishing their conversation before helping us. The room was dirty, the floor was stained and is in need of a decent clean. The safety fire doors were always left open, I watched a staff member go through them and not even care just left it open - a major safety issue that I am sure the Fire Marshall would be interested in this. For the price we paid I would have expected a better standard.
